mapper.select: select id, session_id, agent_id, agent_name, media_type, start_time, end_time, duration, create_time, update_time from t_agent_session_detail where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_agent_session_detail(session_id, agent_id, agent_name, media_type, start_time, end_time, duration, create_time, update_time) values (#{sessionId}, #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{mediaType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{duration}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_agent_session_detail(session_id, agent_id, agent_name, media_type, start_time, end_time, duration, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.sessionId}, #{entity.agentId}, #{entity.agentName}, #{entity.mediaType}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.duration}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into t_agent_session_detail(session_id, agent_id, agent_name, media_type, start_time, end_time, duration, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.sessionId}, #{entity.agentId}, #{entity.agentName}, #{entity.mediaType}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.duration}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update session_id = values(session_id), agent_id = values(agent_id), agent_name = values(agent_name), media_type = values(media_type), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), duration = values(duration), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update t_agent_session_detail
session_id = #{sessionId},
agent_id = #{agentId},
agent_name = #{agentName},
media_type = #{mediaType},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
duration = #{duration},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
